revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=MiniStation Air |revision=(HDW-P500U3) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/31/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Mapower Electronics |manuf_model=WiFi DAS |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile NAS,hard drive enclosure |fcc_id=FDI-01309347-0,LD3WIFIDAS21 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN25Q64 |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L2561616A-6T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu= |flags=battery, portable, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=10:6F:3F }} '''Buffalo MiniStation Air 500GB (HDW-P500U3)'''
[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/ru/produkcija/ustroistva-khranenija-dannykh/perenosnye-nakopiteli/ministationtm/hdw-pu3-ministation-air/ Product page] (RU) :Linux kernel spotted insight of firmware, but no source is provided: :[http://buffalo.jp/support_ap/support/products/hdw_pu3.html Support page on '''Buffalo''']
*HDW-PU3 series - for a non-''Buffalo'' branded WiFi DAS, :see [[Mapower Electronics WiFi DAS (WI21)]]
*"EAW2-055-BF-10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label in the internal FCC photos shows the device with a 00:0A:D8 OUI. *It seem that the internal HDD is connected to the Ralink SoC via :USB 2.0 and has a external USB 3.0 port to connect directly to the drive. *The device has a 2860mAh (11Wh) ''Buffalo'' branded Li-ion battery.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.3dnews.ru/645096 On '''3dNews'''] *[http://cheklab.ru/archives/3698 On '''ChekLab''']
